001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import com.google.common.annotations.VisibleForTesting;
004import jakarta.activation.DataHandler;
005import jakarta.activation.DataSource;
006import jakarta.mail.*;
007import jakarta.mail.internet.*;
008import jakarta.mail.util.ByteArrayDataSource;
009import org.w3c.dom.Document;
010
011import javax.xml.transform.TransformerException;
012import java.io.*;
013import java.util.function.Consumer;
014
015/**
016 * This program presents a survey that all students in CS410J should
017 * answer.  It emails the results of the survey to the TA and emails a
018 * receipt back to the student.
019 */
020public class Survey extends EmailSender {
021  @VisibleForTesting
022  static final String STUDENT_XML_FILE_NAME = "me.xml";
023
024  private final PrintWriter out;
025  private final PrintWriter err;
026  private final BufferedReader in;
027
028  private boolean sendEmail = true;
029  private final File xmlFileDir;
030
031  public Survey(PrintStream out, PrintStream err, InputStream in, File xmlFileDir) {
032    this.out = new PrintWriter(out, true);
033    this.err = new PrintWriter(err, true);
034    this.in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(in));
035    this.xmlFileDir = xmlFileDir;
036  }
037
038  /**
039   * Returns a textual summary of a <code>Student</code>
040   */
041  private String getSummary(Student student) {
042    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
043    sb.append("Name: ").append(student.getFullName()).append("\n");
044    sb.append("UNIX login: ").append(student.getId()).append("\n");
045    if (student.getEmail() != null) {
046      sb.append("Email: ").append(student.getEmail()).append("\n");
047    }
048    if (student.getMajor() != null) {
049      sb.append("Major: ").append(student.getMajor()).append("\n");
050    }
051    sb.append("Enrolled in: ").append(student.getEnrolledSection().asString()).append("\n");
052    return sb.toString();
053  }
054
055  /**
056   * Ask the student a question and return his response
057   */
058  private String ask(String question) {
059    out.print(breakUpInto80CharacterLines(question));
060    out.print(" ");
061    out.flush();
062
063    String response = null;
064    try {
065      response = in.readLine();
066
067    } catch (IOException ex) {
068      printErrorMessageAndExit("** IOException while reading response", ex);
069    }
070
071    return response;
072  }
073
074  /**
075   * Prints out usage information for this program
076   */
077  private void usage() {
078    err.println("\nusage: java Survey [options]");
079    err.println("  where [options] are:");
080    err.println("  -mailServer serverName    Mail server to send mail");
081    err.println("  -saveStudentXmlFile       Save a copy of the generated student.xml file");
082    err.println("\n");
083    System.exit(1);
084  }
085
086  public static void main(String[] args) {
087    Survey survey = new Survey(System.out, System.err, System.in, new File(System.getProperty("user.dir")));
088    survey.takeSurvey(args);
089  }
090
091  @VisibleForTesting
092  void takeSurvey(String... args) {
093    parseCommandLine(args);
094
095    printIntroduction();
096
097    Student student = gatherStudentInformation();
098
099    String learn = ask("What do you hope to learn in CS410J?");
100    String comments = ask("What else would you like to tell me?");
101
102    addNotesToStudent(student, learn, comments);
103
104    writeStudentXmlToFile(getXmlBytes(student));
105
106    emailSurveyResults(student, learn, comments);
107
108  }
109
110  private void addNotesToStudent(Student student, String learn, String comments) {
111    if (isNotEmpty(learn)) {
112      student.addNote(student.getFullName() + " would like to learn " + learn);
113    }
114
115    if (isNotEmpty(comments)) {
116      student.addNote(student.getFullName() + " has these comments: " + comments);
117    }
118  }
119
120  private Student gatherStudentInformation() {
121    String firstName = ask("What is your first name?");
122    String lastName = ask("What is your last name?");
123    String nickName = ask("What is your nickname? (Leave blank if " +
124                          "you don't have one)");
125    String id = ask("MANDATORY: What is your MCECS UNIX login id?");
126
127    if (isEmpty(id)) {
128      printErrorMessageAndExit("** You must enter a valid MCECS UNIX login id");
129
130    } else if (isEmailAddress(id)) {
131      printErrorMessageAndExit("** Your student id cannot be an email address");
132    }
133
134    Student student = new Student(id);
135    setValueIfNotEmpty(firstName, student::setFirstName);
136    setValueIfNotEmpty(lastName, student::setLastName);
137    setValueIfNotEmpty(nickName, student::setNickName);
138
139    askQuestionAndSetValue("What is your email address (doesn't have to be PSU)?", student::setEmail);
140    askQuestionAndSetValue("What is your major?", student::setMajor);
141
142    askEnrolledSectionQuestion(student);
143
144    return student;
145  }
146
147  @VisibleForTesting
148  static boolean isEmailAddress(String id) {
149    try {
150      new InternetAddress(id, true /* strict */);
151      return true;
152
153    } catch (AddressException e) {
154      return false;
155    }
156  }
157
158  private void askEnrolledSectionQuestion(Student student) {
159    String answer = ask("MANDATORY: Are you enrolled in the undergraduate or graduate section of this course? [u/g]");
160    if (isEmpty(answer)) {
161      printErrorMessageAndExit("Missing enrolled section. Please enter a \"u\" or \"g\"");
162    }
163
164    if (answer.toLowerCase().startsWith("u")) {
165      student.setEnrolledSection(Student.Section.UNDERGRADUATE);
166
167    } else if (answer.toLowerCase().startsWith("g")) {
168      student.setEnrolledSection(Student.Section.GRADUATE);
169
170    } else {
171      printErrorMessageAndExit("Unknown section \"" + answer + "\".  Please enter a \"u\" or \"g\"");
172    }
173
174  }
175
176  private void askQuestionAndSetValue(String question, Consumer<String> setter) {
177    String answer = ask(question);
178    setValueIfNotEmpty(answer, setter);
179  }
180
181  static void setValueIfNotEmpty(String string, Consumer<String> setter) {
182    if (isNotEmpty(string)) {
183      setter.accept(string);
184    }
185  }
186
187  private void emailSurveyResults(Student student, String learn, String comments) {
188    String summary = verifyInformation(student);
189
190    if (sendEmail) {
191      // Email the results of the survey to the TA and CC the student
192      out.println("Emailing your information to the Grader");
193
194      MimeMessage message = createEmailMessage(student);
195      MimeBodyPart textPart = createEmailText(learn, comments, summary);
196      MimeBodyPart xmlFilePart = createXmlAttachment(student);
197      addAttachmentsAndSendEmail(message, textPart, xmlFilePart);
198    }
199  }
200
201  private void addAttachmentsAndSendEmail(MimeMessage message, MimeBodyPart textPart, MimeBodyPart filePart) {
202    // Finally, add the attachments to the message and send it
203    try {
204      Multipart mp = new MimeMultipart();
205      mp.addBodyPart(textPart);
206      mp.addBodyPart(filePart);
207
208      message.setContent(mp);
209
210      Transport.send(message);
211
212      logSentEmail(message);
213
214    } catch (MessagingException ex) {
215      printErrorMessageAndExit("** Exception while adding parts and sending", ex);
216    }
217  }
218
219  private void logSentEmail(MimeMessage message) throws MessagingException {
220    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
221    sb.append("\nAn email with with subject \"");
222    sb.append(message.getSubject());
223    sb.append("\" was sent to ");
224
225    Address[] recipients = message.getAllRecipients();
226    for (int i = 0; i < recipients.length; i++) {
227      Address recipient = recipients[i];
228      sb.append(recipient);
229      if (i < recipients.length - 2) {
230        sb.append(", ");
231
232      } else if (i < recipients.length - 1) {
233        sb.append(" and ");
234      }
235    }
236
237    out.println(breakUpInto80CharacterLines(sb.toString()));
238  }
239
240  private MimeBodyPart createXmlAttachment(Student student) {
241    byte[] xmlBytes = getXmlBytes(student);
242
243    DataSource ds = new ByteArrayDataSource(xmlBytes, "text/xml");
244    DataHandler dh = new DataHandler(ds);
245    MimeBodyPart filePart = new MimeBodyPart();
246    try {
247      String xmlFileTitle = student.getId() + ".xml";
248
249      filePart.setDataHandler(dh);
250      filePart.setFileName(xmlFileTitle);
251      filePart.setDescription("XML file for " + student.getFullName());
252
253    } catch (MessagingException ex) {
254      printErrorMessageAndExit("** Exception with file part", ex);
255    }
256    return filePart;
257  }
258
259  private void writeStudentXmlToFile(byte[] xmlBytes) {
260    File file = new File(this.xmlFileDir, STUDENT_XML_FILE_NAME);
261    try (FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(file)) {
262      fos.write(xmlBytes);
263      fos.flush();
264
265    } catch (IOException e) {
266      printErrorMessageAndExit("Could not write student XML file: " + file, e);
267    }
268
269    out.println("\nSaved student XML file to " + file + "\n");
270  }
271
272  private MimeBodyPart createEmailText(String learn, String comments, String summary) {
273    // Create the text portion of the message
274    StringBuilder text = new StringBuilder();
275    text.append("Results of CS410J Survey:\n\n");
276    text.append(summary);
277    text.append("\n\nWhat do you hope to learn in CS410J?\n\n");
278    text.append(learn);
279    text.append("\n\nIs there anything else you'd like to tell me?\n\n");
280    text.append(comments);
281    text.append("\n\nThanks for filling out this survey!\n\nDave");
282
283    MimeBodyPart textPart = new MimeBodyPart();
284    try {
285      textPart.setContent(text.toString(), "text/plain");
286
287      // Try not to display text as separate attachment
288      textPart.setDisposition("inline");
289
290    } catch (MessagingException ex) {
291      printErrorMessageAndExit("** Exception with text part", ex);
292    }
293    return textPart;
294  }
295
296  private MimeMessage createEmailMessage(Student student) {
297    MimeMessage message = null;
298    try {
299      InternetAddress studentEmail = newInternetAddress(student.getEmail(), student.getFullName());
300      String subject = "CS410J Survey for " + student.getFullName();
301      message = newEmailTo(newEmailSession(false), TA_EMAIL).from(studentEmail).withSubject(subject).createMessage();
302
303      InternetAddress[] cc = { studentEmail };
304      message.setRecipients(Message.RecipientType.CC, cc);
305
306    } catch (AddressException ex) {
307      printErrorMessageAndExit("** Exception with email address", ex);
308
309    } catch (MessagingException ex) {
310      printErrorMessageAndExit("** Exception while setting recipients email", ex);
311    }
312    return message;
313  }
314
315  private byte[] getXmlBytes(Student student) {
316    // Create a temporary "file" to hold the Student's XML file.  We
317    // use a byte array so that potentially sensitive data (SSN, etc.)
318    // is not written to disk
319    byte[] bytes = null;
320
321    Document xmlDoc = XmlDumper.toXml(student);
322
323
324    try {
325      bytes = XmlHelper.getBytesForXmlDocument(xmlDoc);
326
327    } catch (TransformerException ex) {
328      ex.printStackTrace(System.err);
329      System.exit(1);
330    }
331    return bytes;
332  }
333
334  private String verifyInformation(Student student) {
335    String summary = getSummary(student);
336
337    out.println("\nYou entered the following information about " +
338                "yourself:\n");
339    out.println(summary);
340
341    String verify = ask("\nIs this information correct (y/n)?");
342    if (!verify.equals("y")) {
343      printErrorMessageAndExit("** Not sending information.  Exiting.");
344    }
345    return summary;
346  }
347
348  private void printErrorMessageAndExit(String message) {
349    printErrorMessageAndExit(message, null);
350  }
351
352  private void printErrorMessageAndExit(String message, Throwable ex) {
353    err.println(message);
354    if (ex != null) {
355      ex.printStackTrace(err);
356    }
357    System.exit(1);
358  }
359
360  private static boolean isNotEmpty(String string) {
361    return string != null && !string.equals("");
362  }
363
364  private boolean isEmpty(String string) {
365    return string == null || string.equals("");
366  }
367
368  private void printIntroduction() {
369    // Ask the student a bunch of questions
370    String welcome =
371      "Welcome to the CS410J Survey Program.  I'd like to ask you a couple of " +
372      "questions about yourself.  Except for your UNIX login id and the section " +
373      "that you are enrolled in, no question " +
374      "is mandatory.  Your answers will be emailed to the Grader and a receipt " +
375      "will be emailed to you.";
376
377    out.println("");
378    out.println(breakUpInto80CharacterLines(welcome));
379    out.println("");
380  }
381
382  @VisibleForTesting
383  static String breakUpInto80CharacterLines(String message) {
384    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
385    int currentLineLength = 0;
386    String[] words = message.split(" ");
387    for (String word : words) {
388      if (currentLineLength + word.length() > 80) {
389        sb.append('\n');
390        sb.append(word);
391        currentLineLength = word.length();
392
393      } else {
394        if (currentLineLength > 0) {
395          sb.append(' ');
396        }
397        sb.append(word);
398        currentLineLength += word.length() + 1;
399      }
400
401    }
402    return sb.toString();
403  }
404
405  private void parseCommandLine(String[] args) {
406    // Parse the command line
407    for (int i = 0; i < args.length; i++) {
408      String arg = args[i];
409      if (arg.equals("-mailServer")) {
410        if (++i >= args.length) {
411          err.println("** Missing mail server name");
412          usage();
413        }
414
415        serverName = arg;
416
417      } else if (arg.equals("-noEmail")) {
418        sendEmail = false;
419
420      } else if (arg.startsWith("-")) {
421        err.println("** Unknown command line option: " + arg);
422        usage();
423
424      } else {
425        err.println("** Spurious command line: " + arg);
426        usage();
427      }
428    }
429  }
